original_text: But there were not made for the house of the Lord basins of silver, snuffers, bowls, trumpets, or any vessels of gold, or of silver, from the money that was brought into the house of the Lord,
korean_text: 여호와의 성전에 드린 그 은으로 그 성전의 은 대접이나 불집게나 주발이나 나팔이나 아무 금 그릇이나 은 그릇도 만들지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: But there were not made for the house of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 주의 집을 위해 만들어지지 않았으니

sentences.original_text: basins of silver, snuffers, bowls, trumpets,
or any vessels of gold, or of silver,
that was brought into the house of the Lord,
